Does anyone else get hangs from new blu ray rips? Its strange every time I get new movies from here that are minimum 720p my laptop starts to hang. I tried to find the culprit but it seems its these files. And yes, I'm talking about transformers from here (mkv.) I ran my task manager and it was eating all my RAM (I have 4GB RAM) and it was eating 3.7GB RAM. In addition, my computer was going snail speeds. I tried to delete the file and it didn't let me. I did some research and I found sometimes CPUs lock files and folders. So I used unlocker.exe and it worked. But then immediately it happened again. It dropped from 3.7GB RAM to 700MB RAM (usage.) Also this never happened before. I have old movies that are 1080p and over 6GB that worked fine. IE. KNowing and Gnomoe and Juliet. Those and others work fine (blu ray.) But these new ones are killing me. Am I the only one? It can't be my background resources as mentioned with other blu rays worked. RAM is fine and everything. I don't know what this movie makes my laptop run slow. I have Windows 7, intel core i5 2.4GHZ x2 4GB RAM. Anyone?
Wake up everyone! Movies like this one are meant to be watched in Blu Ray and in Blu Ray only !
